# Mystagogue (MG) SOP This is the list of procedures, responsibilities, and duties of the [color=#1b67a5][bold]Mystagogue[/bold][/color] of this station.
The Mystagogue operates as a combination of Mantis, Cataloguer, and Chaplain in terms of their special traits. They are more connected to the psionic powers than others.
## Green Alert 1. The Mystagogue must make sure Research is being done, and monitor Anomalies and Artifacts progress, including Robotics as well.
2. The Mystagogue is permitted to carry a telescopic baton and flash.
3. The Mystagogue is not permitted to bring harmful chemicals outside of Epistemics.
4. The Mystagogue is permitted to carry/wear their Experimental Hardsuit on them, but should keep it inactive unless necessary, for personal safety.
5. The Mystagogue is permitted to change the AI Unit's lawset, provided they receive general approval from the Captain and another Head of Staff. If there are no other Heads of Staff available, Captain approval will suffice.
6. The Mystagogue must ensure the cyborg computer is kept safe and used appropriately, avoiding any unnecessary damage to crew or NanoTrasen property.
## Blue Alert 1. All guidelines from [color=#388c34]Green Alert[/color] carry over to [color=#1b67a5]Blue Alert[/color]. No special guidelines added.
## Red Alert 1. Guidelines 1, 4, 5, and 6 carry over from [color=#388c34]Green Alert[/color].
2. In addition to the telescopic baton and flash, the Mystagogue is permitted to carry a single weapon created in the Protolathe, with permission from Captain, Head of Security, and/or Warden. Exceptions apply for extreme emergencies, permitting the use without approval, for cases such as Blobs, Nuclear Operatives, and/or Delta Alert.
3. The Mystagogue is permitted to bring harmful chemicals outside of Security so long as it is for Security personnel. Said chemicals must be for security-oriented purposes, such as thermite, controlled explosives, crowd control, biohazard containment, et cetera.
4. The Mystagogue should ensure that AI and Cyborgs are to remain under control of crew personnel (not corrupted) to the best of their ability.
## White Alert 1. All guidelines from [color=#388c34]Green Alert[/color] carry over.
2. The Mystagogue is to clear out the Epistemics Department of all personnel.
3. The Mystagogue is to assist the Chaplain in sacrificing captures psionic users to lower the Glimmer level.
4. The Mystagogue is to assist and direct the Mantis and Cataloguer in finding and hunting down Psionic Users that abusing their powers.
5. The Mystagogue is to direct Epistemics personnel in assisting the Mystagogue, Mantis, Cataloguer, and Chaplain.
